short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Log and track changes made to your digital marketing campaigns.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Digital Marketer's Change Log is an essential Chrome extension for anyone overseeing digital marketing efforts, offering an efficient way to document modifications made to marketing campaigns. 

Designed with simplicity and effectiveness in mind, this tool is your central hub for logging all campaign changes, ensuring nothing slips through the cracks.

Features & Benefits:

Centralised Change Logs: Keep track of all changes made to your marketing campaigns in one easily accessible location. Whether it's budget adjustments, targeting shifts, or creative updates, log them in seconds.

Date and Time Stamped Entries: Every entry is automatically date and time stamped for precise record-keeping, ensuring you have a detailed history of your campaign's evolution.

Export to CSV: Need to share your change log with team members or clients? Quickly export your logs to a CSV file for easy sharing and analysis.

Simple Interface: Enjoy a clean, intuitive interface that makes logging changes quick and hassle-free. No more digging through emails or scattered notes.

Instructions:
Install the extension with just one click.
Pin to tool bar.
Click to open and log.
Export logs as a CSV.
